title: Beyond Talking Points Ep. 45: A discussion on Foucault-Chomsky debate Ft. Keegan (02/16/2021)
description: In the 45th Episode of Beyond Talking Points, Matt and Matt are joined by a special guest: Matthew's friend Keegan. Keegan and the Matts discuss the November 1971 debate between American linguist and philosopher Noam Chomsky and the late French philosopher and historian of science Michel Foucault. Foucault and Chomsky were discussing two primary question: 'does human nature exist?' and 'what is justice?'
